Posts.Content: Thank you, took on everything you have all said and contacted RMH Sutton and they have explained to me what is happening and I feel less scared and worried now.   Thank you
Posts.Title: Newbie to site, sharp pain in left breast like an electric shock....

Posts.Content: Hi Everyone Can anyone tell me please after chemo and radiotherapy to left side of body mainly breast, under arm and kneck, is it normal after nearly 2 years to get sharp pain like electric shock in the nipple area of breast, I also have lymphoedema in that area and left arm! I have a momogram booked at RMH Sutton next week so did not want to bother the hospital unless I have to knowing how busy they are and was hoping I coulf find the answer here!   Thank you   Regards
